content:
I am a PhD student in the Department of Statistics at the University of Washington. I am broadly interested in Bayesian Machine Learning and Statistical Modelling Techniques. Before coming to UW, I worked as an analyst with North American Liability Strategies team in Deutsche Bank (DB). At DB, I advised North American corporate clients on their liability strategies including liability management, capital structure analysis, ratings and pension advisory.
I did my bachelors and masters in Mathematics and Scientific Computing from Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur in 2017 where I was fortunate to work with Prof. Debasis Kundu, Prof. Amit Mitra and Prof. Piyush Rai. During my stay at IIT Kanpur, I have developed a strong skill set in areas of Bayesian Machine Learning and Statistical Modelling Techniques and their applications to everyday life.
You can find my resume here.

title: Anupreet Porwal
